QuestData.Title: The Remedy of Lordaeron
QuestData.Description:
The time has come. By the Light, I pray our plan works.
Master Apothecary Faranell's wagons have reproduced the plague eater many times over, and the bats are ready to deploy them.
If you see a place where our forces could spread even more of the remedy, you can signal them with a flare.
Take to the skies, and let's put an end to this blight. For Lordaeron, and for the Forsaken.
QuestData.LogDescription: Mount a Shadowbat and deploy Plague Eaters in the Ruins of Lordaeron.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Lilian Voss in the courtyard of the Ruins of Lordaeron.

Objectives.Objective: Drop Plague Eaters in Ruins of Lordaeron
